monitoringtool

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • monitoringtool.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, javafx.beans.InvalidationListener, View

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.beans.InvalidationListener, java.lang.Runnable, View
    Implementation of Controller and View (method update) in the MVC pattern. The style of the view is defined in monitoringview.fxml, which uses style.css.

      • updateQuery

        public void updateQuery()
        Method to update the query. This implementation calls the method updateQuery(boolean) with the parameter false.

      • updateQuery

        public void updateQuery(boolean changeColumns)
        Method to update the query
        Parameters:
        changeColumns - Indicates, whether the columns shall be reloaded. This is not necessary, when the query has not changed and lets the order defined by the user stay.
